body: Please congratulate Polar_Express on his recent promotion to Map Developer on The Avicus Network! Welcome to the team buddy! <3
body_tagged: Please congratulate Polar_Express on his recent promotion to Map Developer on The Avicus Network! Welcome to the team buddy! <3
title: New Map Developer! (Polar_Express)

replies.body: STOP THE BICKERING. You know where to send complaints, you know not to discuss this on the forums. Go ahead and complain how the staff are evil, because it may result in a punishment. Same applies to anything directed at other players.
replies.body_tagged: STOP THE BICKERING. You know where to send complaints, you know not to discuss this on the forums. Go ahead and complain how the staff are evil, because it may result in a punishment. Same applies to anything directed at other players.

replies.body: Just about time this promotion was done :) grats polar
replies.body_tagged: Just about time this promotion was done :) grats polar

replies.body:
I sent in a polite report with evidence and talked with staff about this behavior specifically and got nothing... 
I'm just saying the staff selection is a bit weak- this is an example of a staff member who has recently been homophobic and rude, and slightly less recently thought it'd be jolly to cuss and swear at me on the forums when critical feedback was left on a map. Staff aren't evil, in fact you're an example of a staff member I like, but some of them are pretty rude/immature.
